Variables¶

This is the SASS binding for the Variables plugin. Please read Variables for usage information.

Convention: blue leaf modules should only create variables starting with “bl-”.

SASS¶

@mixin initvar($variable,$value:false,$type:"simple")

Initializes a variable at the current element

$variable

A preprocessed variable name.

$value

A preprocessed value. In case of a simple variable type, this has to be true or false, otherwise it is a string.

$type

The variable type; simple, group or stack.
